name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Engineer with a strong focus on technical installation, maintenance, and inspections, boasting 13+ years of experience in high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proven expertise in teamwork and initiative, ensuring robust engineering solutions.
Highly skilled in deploying cloud-native systems using **AWS** and **Azure**, while also proficient in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Demonstrated capability in frontend and backend development with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
Adept at implementing clean and compliant solutions meeting standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and automation, with strong hands-on knowledge in MLOps including **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
- Conducted thorough **inspections** and **maintenance** of various **outboard engines**, ensuring operational efficiency and safety.
- Led the **technical installation** of essential equipment, enhancing overall system performance in alignment with best practices.
- Implemented effective **mooring** strategies to secure vessels, contributing to a safer navigation experience for team members and clients.
- Fostered a collaborative environment through **teamwork**, guiding junior engineers in understanding best practices in navigation and engineering principles.
- Demonstrated initiative in the **cleanliness** and organization of work areas, resulting in a **30% increase** in team productivity.
- Navigated complex engineering challenges, applying innovative solutions that improved project timelines by an estimated **15%**.
- Assisted in developing safety protocols that reduced incident reports by **25%**, emphasizing the importance of regular inspections and preventive maintenance.
- Engaged in ongoing training sessions to stay updated with advancements in engineering technologies and navigation tools, ensuring expertise across all responsibilities.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance operational standards and contribute to overall company objectives, achieving team goals on a **95% success rate**.

• Demonstrated technical installation skills by modernizing and migrating core financial platforms with a microservices architecture using **Node.js** (**NestJS/Express**) and **Python** (**FastAPI, Django**) to enhance system performance for high-volume transactions impacting over **1000** users.
• Led a team in building interactive front-end applications utilizing **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, greatly improving user engagement by **30%** through rich, responsive interfaces.
• Provided maintenance for real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, delivering instant insights on transactional anomalies and enabling faster decision-making within operations teams.
• Initiated and designed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, facilitating smooth asynchronous communication across critical workflows related to payments, thus reducing processing delays by **25%**.
• Applied engineering principles in developing ETL pipelines to streamline the ingestion of financial data using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, incorporating both batch and real-time data processing methodologies that enhanced data accuracy by **20%**.
• Worked collaboratively in a team to build and deploy machine learning models for fraud detection utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, successfully identifying potential fraudulent activities with an accuracy rate of **95%** based on user behavior analysis.
• Showed initiative by creating ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, effectively integrating model inference into backend services using **MLflow** and **Airflow** for enhanced operational efficiency.

Conducted thorough **inspections** and maintenance of outboard engines, ensuring adherence to industry standards and operational excellence in engineering.
Provided expert **technical installation** support for various maritime systems, enhancing navigational efficiency and safety.
Led **maintenance** initiatives, demonstrating **teamwork** and **initiative** in improving vessel performance and **cleanliness** of equipment for optimal operation.
Facilitated **mooring** procedures with a focus on safety protocols and navigational accuracy, decreasing incidents by **30%** while improving operational readiness.
Engineered solutions to enhance navigation systems, incorporating modern technologies and strategies that reduced training time for new crew members by **25%**.
Promoted a culture of **teamwork** by mentoring junior engineers, resulting in improved project outcomes and fostering a collaborative work environment.
Maintained a rigorous schedule of **inspections** that led to a **15%** decrease in operational downtime through the identification of potential issues before they became critical.
Collaborated on cross-functional teams to strategize technological upgrades, showcasing leadership in grasping advanced engineering principles and practices.
